description: This thing detects all the games I have... Except my Steam games.

Super convenient launcher with a ton of inoperability and clean interface. Been using it for months as a way to aggregate all my programs/games without needing to worry about where/how they're installed. Being able to easily customize the launch command is incredibly useful too. Deserves more love.
A simple yet great application to have all your games in one place, it just works and it's great!
A very handy and pretty tool, imports from many game platforms.
i have a question i have .exe and when i put it in the app it deosnt run but outside the app it deos so wondering how i can fix it i do have wine
The app does in fact pull games from steam and lets me add my own executables, but I just really wish I could add folders.
summary: Works like a charm! I just really wish you could add folders..

description: I think that this app is really great. Imported every game instantly without any problems and it looks elegant, modern and sleek. The games launch like they normally would and it just works. Great job :D
Sin lugar a dudas es el mejor, solo desearía que tuviera soporte para control
summary: El mejor agregador de juegos para GNOME
